DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Pyrosequencing fasta file from bacteria associated with the trophosome of Ridgeia piscesae - A Canadian Healthy Oceans Network Population Connectivity project, PC-11
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Partial SSU rRNA gene sequences obtained from the trophosome of Ridgeia piscesae in hydrothermal habitats contrasted by flow regime. This data was obtained from pyrosequencing.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: 454-pyrosequencing
catalyzed reporter deposition-fluorescence in situ hybridization
hydrothermal vents
symbiosis
vestimentiferans
